content:
Below are the top Data Science project ideas to master the technology:

  • Movie Recommendation System Project
  • Customer Segmentation using Machine Learning
  • Sentiment Analysis Model in R
  • Uber Data Analysis Project
  • Credit Card Fraud Detection Project in R

Source : https://data-flair.training/blogs/data-science-projects-code/?utm_source=quora&utm_medium=referral
title: Top 5 Data Science Projects with Source Code to kick-start your Career
